item.title: NEOGEN CORP 10-K
item.description: NEOGEN CORP, which is in the In Vitro & In Vivo Diagnostic Substances [2835] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 27, 2022 had 27289 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: neogen - 389 instances products - 266 instances 2022 - 252 instances may - 239 instances 2021 - 215 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
